testCases.label: Test successful login for admin user
testCases.description: Verifies that the login function permits access when using the hardcoded credentials 'admin' and 'qwerty'.

testCases.label: Test failed login for admin with incorrect password
testCases.description: Verifies that the login function denies access when 'admin' uses an incorrect password, 'password'.

testCases.label: Test failed login for admin with another incorrect password
testCases.description: Verifies that the login function denies access when 'admin' uses another incorrect password, '123456'.

testCases.label: Test successful login for standard user
testCases.description: Verifies that the login function permits access when using the hardcoded credentials 'user' and 'password'.

testCases.label: Test failed login for standard user with incorrect password
testCases.description: Verifies that the login function denies access when 'user' uses an incorrect password, 'qwerty'.

testCases.label: Test failed login for standard user with another incorrect password
testCases.description: Verifies that the login function denies access when 'user' uses another incorrect password, '123456'.

testCases.label: Test failed login for unknown user
testCases.description: Verifies that the login function denies access for a user, 'guest', who does not match any hardcoded credentials.
